thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 9 of 112
thread.title: Patricia Oscar

author: Patricia Oscar
title: Patricia Oscar
text: I love to shop on Bibio.com because I am actually shopping at many bookstores and museums all at once! Using the advanced search option, if the book is available it will show up. The best way to search for a hard to find book is to make several individual searches: 1. author first, 2. title, 3.keyword , 4. publisher. For my convenience I can place a book on my wish list, then go back and compare it to similar items. Sometimes a book on my wish list is sold to someone else before I get to order it. That is ok. I will find another one. It is a good idea to search for your wanted items at least once a week.
